channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Ukraine War Was Always Going To End This Way
item.description: From the very beginning it was clear that Ukraine’s borders, a relic of Soviet propaganda, would have to change.

item.title: SCOOP: Stacy Garrity launches Republican campaign for Pennsylvania governor
item.description: Army veteran and state treasurer Stacy Garrity entered a likely competitive Pennsylvania governor race against popular incumbent Josh Shapiro.

item.description: “If this anti-satellite nuclear weapon would be put in space, it would be the end of the space age,” Rep. Mike Turner said.

item.title: Canada’s Assisted Suicide Regime Is the West’s Cry for Help

item.title: Putin’s ‘Peace’ Proposal Would Be a Prelude to More War
item.description: The Russian president is demanding a steep price for peace — on terms so favorable for Moscow that it would likely be a temporary reprieve.
